Hemorrhage.name: Hemorrhage
Hemorrhage.blurb: Darius aims his attacks strategically, causing his target to bleed. This effect stacks up to five times. Enemies that reach max Hemorrhage cause Darius to gain Noxian Might, greatly increasing his damage.
Hemorrhage.description: Innate: Darius' basic attacks on-attack and damaging abilities cause enemies to bleed every 1.25 seconds for 5 seconds, dealing 13 − 30 (based on level) (+ 30% bonus AD)  physical damage over the duration. This can stack up to 5 times for a maximum of 65 − 150 (based on level) (+ 150% bonus AD) physical damage over the duration.
Hemorrhage.description2: Upon applying full Hemorrhage stacks to an enemy  champion or killing one with  Noxian Guillotine, Darius gains Noxian Might for 5 seconds.
Hemorrhage.description3: Noxian Might: Darius gains 30 − 230 (based on level) bonus attack damage and instantly applies full Hemorrhage stacks through his usual means.
Hemorrhage.notes:
* Hemorrhage will not be applied if the basic attack is  dodged or if it  misses.
 Hemorrhage will still be applied if the basic attack is  blocked.

Decimate.name: Decimate
Decimate.blurb: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions hit by the blade.
Decimate.description: Active: Darius hefts his axe,  disarming himself for 0.75 seconds. He then swings it around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, reduced to 35% against enemies hit by the handle.
Decimate.description2: Darius  heals for  15% − 45% (based on enemy champions hit by the blade) missing health. The handle of Darius' axe will not apply  hemorrhage or heal him.

Crippling Strike.name: Crippling Strike
Crippling Strike.blurb: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Movement Speed is slowed.
Crippling Strike.description: Active: Darius' next basic attack within 4 seconds gains  25 bonus range, dealing bonus physical damage and  slowing the target by 90% for 1 second.
Crippling Strike.description2: If Crippling Strike kills the target, it refunds its  mana cost and half of its  cooldown.
Crippling Strike.description3: Crippling Strike resets Darius's basic attack timer, and is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
Crippling Strike.description4: The attack's animation can be cancelled by casting  Decimate, but the attack will still land.
Crippling Strike.notes:
*  Spell shield will block the entire attack (including the base attack damage).
 The empowered basic attack is  unstoppable, meaning no effect can interrupt it other than death, Darius' or the target's. Using  Flash or going into  stasis (i.e  Zhonya's Hourglass,  Guardian Angel) will cancel the animation but the attack will still land.
 Despite its name, Crippling Strike does not induce  cripples.

Apprehend.name: Apprehend
Apprehend.blurb: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.
Apprehend.description2: Active: After a 0.25 second delay, Darius  pulls in all enemies in front of him,  slowing them by 40% for 1 second, and briefly gains  sight of the area around the pull.
Apprehend.notes:
* After the pull, Darius will attempt to basic attack the closest pulled target.
 The armor penetration stacks multiplicatively with other forms of percentage armor reduction.

Noxian Guillotine.name: Noxian Guillotine
Noxian Guillotine.blurb: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.
Noxian Guillotine.description: Active: Darius attempts to execute the targeted enemy champion,  leaping towards them over 0.25 seconds to deal  true damage, increased by 0% −  100% (based on  Hemorrhage stacks).
Noxian Guillotine.description2: If the target dies within 0.15 seconds after being hit by Noxian Guillotine, Darius causes all nearby  minions and  monsters to  flee for 3 seconds during which they are rapidly  slowed by up to 99% over the duration, and is able to recast the ability within 20 seconds at no cost.
Noxian Guillotine.description3: At rank 3, Noxian Guillotine instead completely resets its  cooldown.
Noxian Guillotine.notes:
* The ability does not go on  cooldown or consume  mana if it's interrupted during the leap. This may only happen if:
 Darius or his target dies during the leap.
 Darius loses  sight of his target.
 The target becomes  untargetable.
 The target is too far away.

 Noxian Guillotine's cooldown after the recast or recast window is calculated by taking the values at the end, and using this formula: (Noxian Guillotine's Cooldown - time since first cast) × (1 -  cdr).
 Noxian Guillotine applies  Hemorrhage after the damage.
